Class RESTClientConnector

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.connectors.Connector
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.connectors.ConnectorBase
org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.connectors.restclients.RESTClientConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
RESTClientCalls, SecureConnectorExtension
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpringRESTClientConnector
public abstract class RESTClientConnector extends ConnectorBase implements RESTClientCalls
RESTClientConnector provides the base class for REST Client connectors.
